demos.text: I love this product with all my heart and soul!
demos.reasoning: The customer uses very strong and positive language to express their feelings towards the product, such as "love" and "with all my heart and soul", indicating a highly enthusiastic and affectionate attitude.

demos.text: This is absolutely terrible and I hate it completely.
demos.reasoning: The text contains strong negative language, such as "absolutely terrible" and "hate it completely", which indicates a strong dislike for the subject being discussed.
